locations.name: American Canyon
locations.org: American Canyon Food Pantry - Harvest Freewill Baptist Church
locations.address: 240 Rio Del Mar, American Canyon, CA 94503
locations.description: Food pantry providing assistance to community members. Participants can receive food once every 30 days. Must bring two forms of ID (one with current address and one with birthdate) and shopping bags/box.

locations.name: Indio
locations.org: FIND Mobile Market Distribution - Shadow Hills High School
locations.description: Mobile food distribution service at Shadow Hills High School providing food assistance to the community through FIND Food Bank.
